Author: arrioux999
Text: I feel the exact same way. I have had an assortment of eating problems but it's really a fixation and fantasising about food that is so powerful. It can make you feel euphoric or like complete garbage. For me, I wonder if the fact that whenever something good and bad happened (to me or the family) either way food was the distraction. When my mom left we went to the same restaurant we went years later for my graduation from high school. Maybe it's a culture thing or a foodie thing but food being an amazing distraction AND good mood enhancer is a toxic combination.
